name: Mongrel
description:
Mongrel is an action-platformer with metroidvania elements coming for Windows and hopefully Switch! The game is inspired by Conker’s Bad Fur Day, The Legend of Zelda and Metroidvania-style games. The game has:

- Fully voiced characters.
- Vast world with many contrasting regions.
- Incredibly dynamic main character with a deep expression system.
- Countless secrets and weapons.
